name: CrowdTracks
tag_list: crowd-sourcing, music, crowd-music, crowd, sourcing, music-contests, contests, tracks, recording, ecommerce
overview:
The marketplace for crowdsourced music! - BETA

Description If you’re a musician or a producer and you’d like to start making money with your talents crowdtracks is the place for you!

Just follow these simple steps:

If you need a track, production or mixing for a project:

  1. Create a contest filling the basic information needed, like a description a summary, genre and upload the necessary source tracks.
  2. Select the amounts for the prizes, remember that 1st prize is mandatory but you can motivate musicians by setting a 2nd and/or 3rd place, these amounts are up to you.
  3. Check everything and prepay the contest.
  4. Don’t worry if you don’t like any of the tracks or productions provided by users WE WILL REFUND YOU so 100% satisfaction guaranteed!

If you’re a musician or a producer looking to make cash:

  1. Browse through all the contests our users have posted on www.crowdtracks.com
  2. Select the one that is right for your talents depending on the instrument, genre or project description.
  3. Submit your proposal or proposals (you can send as many as you want) and wait to be awarded one of the prizes offered by the contest holder.
  4. The money has already been prepaid so we on crowdtracks are in charge of paying your prize so don’t worry everything is 100% safe and YOU WILL BE PAYED!
